org.melior.client.corba

Class CorbaClient<T extends IDLEntity,E extends UserException>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.core.ClientConfig
      • org.melior.client.corba.CorbaClient<T,E>

  • public class CorbaClient<T extends IDLEntity,E extends UserException>
extends org.melior.client.core.ClientConfig
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring CORBA client with connection pooling and configurable backoff strategy.

    The client writes timing details to the logs while dispatching CORBA messages to the remote CORBA object. The client converts any exception that occurs during communication with the remote CORBA object, using the provided exception translator.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
